= Introduction =

We use [http://somethingaboutorange.com/mrl/projects/nose/0.11.1/ nose] as testing framework.

= Testing =

== Command cheatsheet ==

  * To install nose:
  {{{ easy_install nose }}}

  * To run tests:
  {{{ nosetests -vs path_to_tests }}}

  * Command usage help:
  {{{ nosetests -h }}}
